EmailTemplate.description: Case closed English email template for GBS center SBFE
EmailTemplate.name: Case Closed (SBFE_en)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been resolved; details enclosed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Your case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been resolved with the following resolution details:
{!Case.Case_Resolution_Details__c}
Please take 5 seconds to answer this one question survey:
How happy were you with the timeliness and accuracy of the resolution?
Thank you
{!Case.Thread_Id}
